text: howard_wolowitz Ooh , more details about the new Star Trek film . There 's going to be a scene depicting Spock 's birth .
raj_koothrappali I 'd be more interested in a scene depicting Spock 's conception .
sheldon_cooper Oh , please . For Vulcans , mating , or , if you will , Pon Farr , it 's an extremely private matter .
leonard_hofstadter Still , I 'd like to know the details . His mother was human , his father was Vulcan , they could n't just conceive .
howard_wolowitz Maybe they had to go to a clinic . Imagine Spock 's dad in a little room with a copy of pointy ears and shapely rears .
raj_koothrappali How come on Star Trek everybody 's private parts are the same . No alien lady ever told Captain Kirk , hey , get your thing out of my nose .
penny Hi , can you help me , I was writing an email and the A key got stuck . Now it 's just going ' aaaaaaa ' .
leonard_hofstadter What did you spill on it ?
penny Nothing . Diet coke . And yoghurt . A little nail polish .
leonard_hofstadter I 'll take a look at it .
howard_wolowitz Gentlemen , switching to local nerd news . Fishman , Chen , Chowdry , McNair are n't fielding a team in the university physics bowl this year .
leonard_hofstadter You 're kidding , why not ?
howard_wolowitz They formed a barbershop quartet , and got a gig playing Knotsbury Farm .
penny Wow , so in your world , you 're like , the cool guys .
howard_wolowitz Recognize .
leonard_hofstadter This is our year ! With those guys out , the entire physics bowl will kneel before Zod .
penny Zod ?
howard_wolowitz Kryptonian villain . Long story .
raj_koothrappali Good story .
sheldon_cooper Well count me out .
howard_wolowitz What ? Why ?

sheldon_cooper You want me to use my intelligence in a tawdry competition ? Would you ask Picasso to play Pictionary ? Would you ask Noah Webster to play Boggle ? Would you ask Jacques Cousteau to play Go Fish ?
leonard_hofstadter Come on , you need a four person team , we 're four people .
sheldon_cooper By that reasoning we should also play bridge , hold up a chuppah and enter the Olympic bobsled competition .
penny I want tickets to that please .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , what , do I need to quote Spock 's dying words to you .
sheldon_cooper No , do n't .
leonard_hofstadter The needs of the many .
howard_wolowitz Outweigh the needs of the few .
sheldon_cooper Or the one . Dammit , I 'll do it .
raj_koothrappali Okay . First order of physics bowl business . We need a truly kick - ass team name . Suggestions .
howard_wolowitz How about the perpetual motion squad ? It 's beyond the laws of physics , plus a little heads up for the ladies .
leonard_hofstadter The ladies ?
howard_wolowitz Perpetual motion squad , we can go all night .
raj_koothrappali I like it .
sheldon_cooper I do n't . Teams are traditionally named after fierce creatures , thus intimidating ones opponent .
raj_koothrappali Then we can be the Bengal Tigers .
sheldon_cooper Poor choice . Gram for gram , no animal exceeds the relative fighting strength of the army ant .
raj_koothrappali Maybe so . But you ca n't incinerate a Bengal Tiger with a magnifying glass .
leonard_hofstadter Let 's put it to a vote . All those in favour ... .

sheldon_cooper Point of order . I move that any vote on team names should be unanimous . No man should be forced to emblazon his chest with the bengal tiger , when common sense dictates it should be an army ant .
leonard_hofstadter Will the gentleman from the great state of denial yield for a question ?
sheldon_cooper I will yield .
leonard_hofstadter After we go through the exercise of an annoying series of votes , all of which the gentleman will lose , does he then intend to threaten to quit if he does not get his way ?
sheldon_cooper He does .
leonard_hofstadter I move we are the Army Ants , all those in favour ?

penny Good afternoon , and welcome to today 's physics bowl practice round . I 'm Penny , and I 'll be your host , because apparently I did n't have anything else to do on a Saturday afternoon , and is n't that just a little sad ? Gentlemen , are you ready ?
leonard_hofstadter Yes .
sheldon_cooper Of course .
howard_wolowitz Fire away .
penny You know , it 's none of my business , but is n't a guy who ca n't speak in front of women going to hold you back a little ?
leonard_hofstadter Oh , uh , he 'll be okay once the women are mixed into the crowd . He only has a problem when they 're one on one and smell nice .
penny Oh , thanks Raj , it 's vanilla oil .
leonard_hofstadter I was actually the one who noticed , okay , let 's just start .
penny Okay , the first question is on the topic of optics . What is the shortest light pulse ever produced ? Dr Cooper .
sheldon_cooper And of course , the answer is 130 adoseconds .
penny That is correct .
leonard_hofstadter I knew that too .
penny Good for you , sweetie . Okay , next question . What is the quantum mechanical effect used to encode data on hard disk drives ? Howard .
sheldon_cooper And of course , the answer is giant magneto resistance .
penny Right .
howard_wolowitz Hey , I buzzed in .
sheldon_cooper But I answered , it 's called teamwork .
howard_wolowitz Do n't you think I should answer the engineering questions ? I am an engineer .
sheldon_cooper By that logic I should answer all the anthropology questions because I 'm a mammal .
leonard_hofstadter Just ask another one .
penny Okay . What artificial satellite has seen glimpses of Einsteins predicted frame dragging ?
sheldon_cooper And of course it 's Gravity Probe B.
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , you have to let somebody else answer .
sheldon_cooper Why ?
penny Because it 's polite .
sheldon_cooper What do manners have to do with it ? This is war . Were the Romans polite when they salted the ground of Carthage to make sure nothing would ever grow again ?
penny Leonard , you said I only had to ask questions .
sheldon_cooper The objective of the competition is to give correct answers , if I know them , why should n't I give them ?
howard_wolowitz Some of us might have the correct answers too .
sheldon_cooper Oh please , you do n't even have a PhD.
howard_wolowitz Alright , that 's it .
leonard_hofstadter Howard , sit down .
howard_wolowitz Okay .
leonard_hofstadter maybe we should take a little break .
sheldon_cooper Good idea , I need my wrist brace , all this button pushing is aggravating my old Nintendo injury .
howard_wolowitz I agree .
penny What did he say ?
howard_wolowitz He compared Sheldon to a disposable feminine cleansing product one might use on a summer 's eve .
penny Yeah , and the bag it came in .
sheldon_cooper Leonard , excellent , I want to show you something .
leonard_hofstadter Can it wait , I need to talk to you .

sheldon_cooper Just look . I 've designed the perfect uniforms for our team . The colors are based on Star Trek , the original series . The three of you will wear support red , and I will wear command gold .
leonard_hofstadter Why do they say AA ?
sheldon_cooper Army Ants .
leonard_hofstadter Is n't that confusing ? AA might mean something else to certain people .
sheldon_cooper Why would a physics bowl team be called anodised aluminum ?
leonard_hofstadter No , I meant ... never mind . Hey , check it out . I got you a Batman cookie jar !
sheldon_cooper Oh neat , what 's the occasion ?
leonard_hofstadter Well , you 're a friend , and you like Batman , and cookies , and you 're off the team .
sheldon_cooper What ?
leonard_hofstadter Howard , Raj and I just had a team meeting .
sheldon_cooper No you did n't .
leonard_hofstadter Yes we did , I just came from it .
sheldon_cooper Okay , I do n't know where you just came from , but it could n't have been a team meeting because I 'm on the team and I was n't there , ergo the team did not meet .
leonard_hofstadter Okay , let me try it this way , uh , I was at a coffee klatch with a couple of friends and one thing led to another and it turns out you 're off the team .
sheldon_cooper Why ?
leonard_hofstadter Because you 're taking all the fun out of it .
sheldon_cooper Well , I 'm sorry , is the winner of the physics bowl the team that has the most fun ?
leonard_hofstadter Okay , let me try it this way , you 're annoying and no - one wants to play with you any more .

sheldon_cooper I see . Well . At this point I should inform you that I intend to form my own team and destroy the molecular bonds that bind your very matter together , and reduce the resulting particulate chaos to tears .
leonard_hofstadter Thanks for the heads up .
sheldon_cooper You 're welcome . One more thing .
leonard_hofstadter Yes .
sheldon_cooper It 's on , bitch .
howard_wolowitz So who 'd he get to be on his team .
leonard_hofstadter He wo n't say . He just smiles , and eats macaroons out of his bat jar .

raj_koothrappali He 's using psychological warfare . We must reply in kind . I say we wait until he looks at us , then laugh like , yes , you are a smart and strong competitor , but we are also smart and strong and we have a reasonable chance of defeating you .
leonard_hofstadter How exactly would that laugh go ?
raj_koothrappali Hee hee hee hee hee hee hee !
howard_wolowitz That sounds more like , we are a tall thin woman who wants to make a coat out of your Dalmatians .
leonard_hofstadter Guys , let 's remember that Sheldon is still our friend and my room mate .
howard_wolowitz So ?
leonard_hofstadter So nothing , let 's destroy him .
sheldon_cooper Gentlemen .
raj_koothrappali Hee hee hee hee hee hee hee !
howard_wolowitz Okay , we 're going to need a strong fourth for our team .
raj_koothrappali You know who 's apparently very smart , is the girl who played TV 's Blossom . She got a PhD in neuroscience or something .
leonard_hofstadter Raj , we 're not getting TV 's Blossom to join our physics bowl team .
raj_koothrappali How about the girl from the Wonder Years ?
howard_wolowitz Gentlemen , I believe I 've found the solution to all our problems .
leonard_hofstadter We ca n't ask Leslie Winkle .
raj_koothrappali Why ? Because you slept together and when she was done with you she discarded you like last night 's chutney ?
leonard_hofstadter Yes .
howard_wolowitz Sometimes you 've got to take one for the team .
raj_koothrappali Yeah . Sack up , dude .
leonard_hofstadter Fine . Here I go , taking one for the team . In the sack . Hey Leslie .
leslie_winkle Hi guys .
leonard_hofstadter Leslie , I have a question for you , and it might be a little awkward , you know , given that I ... .
howard_wolowitz Hit that thang .
leslie_winkle Leonard , there 's no reason to feel uncomfortable just because we 've seen each other 's faces and naked bodies contorted in the sweet agony of coitus .
leonard_hofstadter There 's not ? Gee , cos it sure sounds like there should be .

leslie_winkle Rest assured that any aspects of our sexual relationship regarding your preferences , your idiosyncrasies , your performance , are still protected by the inherent confidentiality of the bedroom .
leonard_hofstadter That 's all very comforting , but if it 's okay , I 'd like to get on with my question now .
leslie_winkle Proceed .
leonard_hofstadter We are entering the physics bowl and we need a fourth for our team .
leslie_winkle No thanks , I 'm really busy with my like sign dilepton super symmetry search .
howard_wolowitz Dilepton , schmilepton , we need you .
leslie_winkle Sorry .
howard_wolowitz Well , we tried . Just have to face Sheldon mano - e - mano - e - mano . A - mano .
leslie_winkle Wait , you 're going up against Sheldon Cooper ?
howard_wolowitz Yes .
leslie_winkle That arrogant , misogynistic East - Texas doorknob that told me I should abandon my work with high energy particles for laundry and child bearing ?
leonard_hofstadter She 's in .
penny So , how do you feel ? Nice and loose ? Come to play ? Got your game face on ? Are you ready ?
leonard_hofstadter Oh , yeah . You know you do n't have to stay for the whole thing .
penny Oh , no , no , I want to . It sounds really interesting .
sheldon_cooper Gentlemen .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon .
howard_wolowitz Sheldon .
raj_koothrappali Hee hee hee hee hee hee hee hee .
penny Sheldon . I 'm just going to sit down .
leonard_hofstadter So , is that your team .

sheldon_cooper Actually , I do n't need a team , I could easily defeat you single - handedly . But the rules require four , so may I introduce , the third floor janitor , he lady from the lunchroom , and , my Spanish is not good , either her son or her butcher . And what about your team ? What rat have you recruited to the SS Sinking Ship ?
leslie_winkle Hello , Sheldon .
sheldon_cooper Leslie Winkle ?
leslie_winkle Yeah , Leslie Winkle . The answer to the question , who made Sheldon Cooper cry like a little girl ?

sheldon_cooper Yes , well , I 'm polymerised tree sap and you 're non - organic adhesive so , whatever verbal projectile you launch in my direction is reflected off of me , returns on its original trajectory , and adheres to you .
leslie_winkle Oh , ouch .
dr_eric_gablehauser Okay , if everyone could please take your seats .
leonard_hofstadter Here 's your tee - shirt .
leslie_winkle PMS ? It 's a couple of days early , but ... .
leonard_hofstadter No , it stands for Perpetual Motion Squad .
leslie_winkle Oh , right , of course , what was I thinking ?
dr_eric_gablehauser Good afternoon everyone , and welcome to this year 's physics bowl . Today 's preliminary match features two great teams ... AA versus PMS .
howard_wolowitz All night long , y' all !
dr_eric_gablehauser Okay , well let 's jump right in , first question , for ten points . What is the isospan singlet partner of the Pi Zero Meson ? PMS ?
leonard_hofstadter The Eta Meson .
dr_eric_gablehauser Correct .
sheldon_cooper Formal protest .
dr_eric_gablehauser On what grounds ?
sheldon_cooper The Velcro on my wrist brace caught on my shirt .
dr_eric_gablehauser Denied . Alright , for ten points , what is the lightest element on earth with no stable isotope . AA ?
sheldon_cooper And of course , the answer is Technetium .
dr_eric_gablehauser Terrific . Next question , what is the force between two uncharged plates due to quantum vacuum fluctuation . PMS ?
raj_koothrappali Sheldon can suck on , the Casimir Effect .
dr_eric_gablehauser Correct .
dr_eric_gablehauser How does a quantum computer factor large numbers . PMS ?
leslie_winkle Shor 's Algorithm .
dr_eric_gablehauser Correct .
sheldon_cooper 4.1855 times ten to the seventh ergs per calorie .
leonard_hofstadter Prevost 's theory of exchanges .
sheldon_cooper Lamda equals one over Pi R squared N.
howard_wolowitz 760 degrees celsius , the approximate temperature of the young lady in the front row .
dr_eric_gablehauser Mr Wolowitz , this is your second warning .
sheldon_cooper A sigma particle .
leslie_winkle Yes , assuming the hypothetical planet has a mass greater than the earth .

dr_eric_gablehauser Correct . Ladies and gentlemen , I hold in my hand the final question . The score now stands AA 1150 , PMS 1175 . So , for one hundred points , and the match , please turn your attention to the formula on the screens . Solve the equation .
raj_koothrappali Holy crap .
leonard_hofstadter What the hell is that .
howard_wolowitz It looks like something they found on the ship at Roswell .
leonard_hofstadter Come on , think , Leslie .
leslie_winkle Leonard , it 's not going to work if you rush me , you have to let me get there .
leonard_hofstadter You 're never going to let that go , are you ?
dr_eric_gablehauser Ten seconds . PMS .
leonard_hofstadter Sorry , I panicked .
howard_wolowitz Then guess .
leonard_hofstadter Um , eight . Point four .
dr_eric_gablehauser I 'm sorry , that 's incorrect . AA , if you can answer correctly , the match is yours .
howard_wolowitz He does n't have it . He 's got squat .
dr_eric_gablehauser AA , I need your answer .
third_floor_janitor The answer is minus eight by alpha .
sheldon_cooper Hang on , hang on a second , that 's not our answer . What are you doing ?
third_floor_janitor Answering question . Winning physics bowl .
sheldon_cooper How do you know anything about physics ?
third_floor_janitor Here I am janitor , in former Soviet Union I am physicist . Leningrad Politechnica . Go Polar Bears .
sheldon_cooper Well that 's a delightful little story , but our arrangement was that you sit here and not say anything , I answer the questions .
third_floor_janitor You did n't answer question .
sheldon_cooper Hey look , now maybe you have democracy now in your beloved Russia , but on this physics bowl team I rule with an iron fist . . Ow !
dr_eric_gablehauser AA , I need your official answer .
sheldon_cooper Well it 's not what he said .
dr_eric_gablehauser Then what is it ?
sheldon_cooper I want a different question .
dr_eric_gablehauser You ca n't have a different question .
sheldon_cooper Formal protest .
dr_eric_gablehauser Denied .
sheldon_cooper Informal protest .
dr_eric_gablehauser Denied . I need your official answer .
sheldon_cooper No . I decline to provide one .
dr_eric_gablehauser Well , that 's too bad , because the answer your teammate gave was correct .
sheldon_cooper That 's your opinion .
dr_eric_gablehauser Alright , the winner of the match is ... .
leonard_hofstadter Hang on . Sheldon , is proving that you are single - handedly smarter than everyone else so important that you would rather lose by yourself than win as part of a team .
sheldon_cooper I do n't understand the question .
leonard_hofstadter Go ahead .
dr_eric_gablehauser The winner is PMS !
leonard_hofstadter Sorry , somebody 's sitting there .
sheldon_cooper Who ?
leonard_hofstadter My Physics Bowl Trophy !
sheldon_cooper That trophy is meaningless , I forfeited , therefore you did not win .
leonard_hofstadter I know someone who would disagree .
sheldon_cooper Who ?
leonard_hofstadter My Physics Bowl Trophy ! ' Leonard is so smart , Sheldon who ? '
sheldon_cooper Alright that is very immature .
leonard_hofstadter You 're right , I 'm sorry . I 'm not !
penny Okay , new contest .
leonard_hofstadter What are you doing ?
penny I 'm settling once and for all who is the smartest around here . Okay , are you ready ?
sheldon_cooper Absolutely .
leonard_hofstadter Bring it on .
penny Okay . Marsha , Jan and Cindy were the three daughters of what TV family ? The Brady Bunch . Okay , Sammy Hagar replaced David Lee Roth as the lead singer in what group ?
sheldon_cooper The Brady Bunch ?
penny Van Halen . Alright , Madonna was married to this Ridgemont High alum . Oh my God , Sean Penn !
leonard_hofstadter How do you know these things ?
penny I go outside and I talk to people . Alright , here , what actor holds the record for being named people magazine 's sexiest man alive ?
sheldon_cooper William Shatner .
leonard_hofstadter Wait , I do n't think it 's Shatner .
sheldon_cooper Then it 's got to be Patrick Stewart .
penny No .
sheldon_cooper Formal protest .
penny Alright , singer who sang ' Oops I Did It Again . ' Okay , Tweetie Bird , taught he taw a what ?
sheldon_cooper Romulan .
penny Yes . He taught he taw a Romulan .
